links.description: Eve Jobs is another lucky celebrity who is enjoying the holiday week in a warm climate. The daughter of Apple founder Steve Jobs showed off her fit figure in a teeny brown string bikini as she lounged on a chair.

links.title: UK government seeks to mitigate workforce disruption from Omicron
links.description: LONDON, Jan 1 (Reuters) - The British government has asked public sector managers to test their contingency plans against a worst-case scenario of 25% staff absence as part of efforts to minimise disruption from the rapid spread of the Omicron variant of COVID-19.
